tool_description: Track the performance of your advertising with instantly activated tracking numbers in 30 countries. Integrate with Google and track down to keyword level.
name: CallTrackingMetrics
title: CallTrackingMetrics

api_list.name: GET Call Detail
DELETE Delete a WebHook
GET Calls
api_list.description: The Calls API allows you easy access to all your call data. You can subscribe to new incoming calls to receive an HTTP request when a call is completed. You can also query the call API to retrieve all past calls.

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: a search string to look for calls with specific callerid, caller_number, called_number, source name, etc...

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: a starting date offset to query

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: a ending date offset to query

api_list.name: List Numbers
api_list.description: The numbers API allows you to search, purchase, and manage settings on each tracking number.

api_list.name: List Text Messages
api_list.description: The SMS API allows you to search, send, and manage text messaging triggers for all capable numbers.

api_list.name: List Accounts
api_list.description: The accounts API allows you to create and manage accounts.

api_list.name: List Users
api_list.description: The users API allows you to create and manage users.

api_list.name: Search Numbers

required_parameters.name: area_code
required_parameters.description: an area code to search and match on

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: the country where you would like to purchase this number. currently supported countries include "US" and "CA"
